difficultyList.Name: Ironman Mode
difficultyList.Tooltip: Ironman Mode restricts you to only one save file. All consequences, including 'Mech loss, MechWarrior death, and failed missions are permanent. Running out of funds or failing any Priority Mission will result in campaign loss. This setting is intended for veterans and those seeking a significant challenge.

difficultyList.Name: Unequipped 'Mechs
difficultyList.Tooltip: When this setting is enabled, new 'Mechs you acquire through salvage will not come with equipped weapons or components, and will need to be customized from scratch.

difficultyList.Name: Parts for 'Mech Assembly
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the number of salvaged or purchased 'Mech parts you must acquire to assemble a new 'Mech. Increase this value to make new 'Mechs rarer and more difficult to obtain. <color=#F79B26>This setting is intended for veterans and those seeking a significant challenge.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Skip Prologue
difficultyList.Tooltip: Skip the prologue of the Campaign. <color=#F79B26>This will bypass the tutorial and some early game missions</color>.

difficultyList.Name: Enemy Force Strength
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting modifies the overall strength of enemy forces. At higher difficulties, you will encounter heavier 'Mechs. <color=#F79B26>This setting does not apply to campaign story missions.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Advanced MechWarriors
difficultyList.Tooltip: In the later parts of the game, new MechWarriors in the Hiring Hall will often have better stats and skills than in the early parts of the game. Modify this setting to change the frequency of new MechWarriors having these improvements.

difficultyList.Name: 'Mech Destruction
difficultyList.Tooltip: When active, this setting will cause any 'Mech disabled by the destruction of its center torso to be lost permanently. <color=#F79B26>This setting is intended for veterans and those seeking a significant challenge.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Contract Payment
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the amount of C-Bills paid by contracts across the entire game. Adjust this setting to make the economic gameplay more or less forgiving. <color=#F79B26>This setting does not apply to campaign story missions.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Salvage
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting changes the amount of salvage you may obtain from negotiation. Adjust this setting to make the economic gameplay more or less forgiving.

difficultyList.Name: MechWarrior Progression
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the amount of experience MechWarriors gain after each mission. Change this setting to adjust the rate at which MechWarriors improve their stats and gain new skills.

difficultyList.Name: Lethality
difficultyList.Tooltip: When this setting is enabled, MechWarriors that are incapacitated in combat will always be killed.

difficultyList.Name: No Rare Salvage
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls whether "+" and "++" items can be found as salvage after a battle. If this setting is enabled, only basic items will be found.

difficultyList.Name: Starter Mech
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select your starter Mech.

difficultyList.Name: Contract Difficulty Variance
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your Choice of Maximum difficulty difference between generated contracts<color=#F79B26>This setting is intended for veterans and those seeking a significant challenge.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Commander Experience Points
difficultyList.Tooltip: Use this to decide for the starting Experience of your Commander

difficultyList.Name: MechWarrior Exponent
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the exponent of raising XP Cost per Level

difficultyList.Name: Starting Money
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select your starting capital.

difficultyList.Name: Mech Bay Speed
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select Mech Bay construction Speeds

difficultyList.Name: Mech Bay Armour Speed
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select the speed at which your armour is changed

difficultyList.Name: Mech Bay CBILLS
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select Mech Bay Cbill Cost

difficultyList.Name: Argo Monthly Payment
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select The modifer strength for Monthly Costs.

difficultyList.Name: Argo Monthly Morale
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select The modifer Argo Monthly Morale.

difficultyList.Name: Shop Selling Prices
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your desired Selling Values.

difficultyList.Name: Scrap Return Values
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your desired Scrapping Payouts.

difficultyList.Name: Starting MedTech Skill
difficultyList.Tooltip: This determines the initial MedTech skill at game start.
